SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArrayIterator<T>
ArrayIterator represents an iterator for traversing elements in an array-based collection sequentially.
ArrayList<T>
ArrayList is an abstract base class representing a list implemented using a dynamic array.
ArrayUnorderedList<T>
ArrayUnorderedList represents an unordered list implemented using a dynamic array.
Connection
Connection represents a link between two rooms in the game map, allowing player movement between connected rooms.
DiceDialog
DiceDialog is a modal dialog that displays an animated dice rolling simulation.
DiceDrawer
DiceDrawer is a utility class for rendering die face representations as images.
DoubleNode<T>
DoubleNode represents a node in a doubly-linked list structure, containing a generic data element and bidirectional pointers to adjacent nodes.
EmptyCollectionException
EmptyCollectionException is thrown when an attempt is made to perform an operation on an empty collection that requires at least one element.
Event
Event represents a special event that can occur during gameplay, containing event details and game impact information.
GameConfig
GameConfig contains all static configuration constants for the Labyrinth of Glory game.
GameController
Controls the game input and interaction between the user and the game logic.
GameEditLogic
Logic for the map editor, handling grid initialization and map creation.
GameEventListener
Interface for listening to game events.
GameGraph
GameGraph extends Graph to represent a game map structure where vertices are Room objects and edges are Connection objects.
GameManager
Manages the game state, players, turns, and game logic.
GameMapGenerator
GameMapGenerator generates and manages the complete game map structure, including rooms, connections between rooms, and item placement.
GameMapLoader
GameMapLoader loads game maps from JSON configuration files.
GameReport
GameReport is responsible for generating the final game report in JSON format.
Graph<T>
 
GraphADT<T>
 
HelpPanel
HelpPanel is a UI panel that displays help and support information about the game.
ImageLoader
ImageLoader provides a utility to load and cache images from the file system.
Item
Item represents a collectible object in the game with a name and type.
Iterator<T>
Iterator represents a generic iterator interface for traversing elements in a collection sequentially.
Lever
Lever represents a puzzle element in the game that can be toggled to control the locked state of multiple connections.
LinearNode<T>
 
LinkedList<T>
LinkedList represents a generic doubly-linked list that maintains references to both the head and tail nodes for efficient insertion and removal at both ends.
LinkedQueue<T>
 
LinkedStack<T>
 
ListADT<T>
 
MainWindow
MainWindow is the main application window that manages all UI panels and game state transitions.
MapEditor
MapEditor is a GUI panel that allows users to create and edit game maps.
MapPanel
MapPanel displays the game map with all rooms, walls, game objects, and players.
MapSerializer
MapSerializer provides functionality to serialize a game map into a JSON file.
MenuPanel
MenuPanel represents the main menu interface of the game.
NoSuchElementException
NoSuchElementException is thrown when an attempt is made to access an element that does not exist in a collection or iterator.
PauseMenuPanel
PauseMenuPanel represents the pause menu interface displayed when the player pauses the game.
Player
Player represents a player in the game, managing identity, game state, inventory, and game statistics.
Question
Question represents a quiz question with multiple choice answers.
QuestionDialog
QuestionDialog represents a modal dialog that displays a question challenge to the player.
QuestionManager
QuestionManager manages the loading and distribution of quiz questions during gameplay.
QueueADT<T>
 
Random
Random is a utility class for generating random numbers.
RandomEventManager
RandomEventManager manages random events that can occur during gameplay.
Report
Report is a utility class for loading game session reports from JSON files.
Report.PlayerPath
PlayerPath is a container class holding a player's movement path during gameplay.
Report.ReportData
ReportData is a container class holding the parsed report information.
ReportDialog
ReportDialog displays the final game report with player statistics and game map visualization.
Room
Room represents a single room/cell in the game map grid.
SetupPanel
SetupPanel provides the user interface for configuring the game before play.
SoundPlayer
Utility class responsible for managing and playing sound effects and ambient music in the game.
StackADT<T>
 
StatsPanel
StatsPanel is a custom JPanel that displays player statistics and inventory during gameplay.
UnorderedListADT<T>
